metrics_conclusion: Floral Fields - Kirby Triple Deluxe has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Floral Fields - Kirby Triple Deluxe is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
